title: How to Get the Infinite Rocket Launcher in Resident Evil 5

steps.headline: Understand the concept of unlocking with special points.
If you have a maxed out weapon.
Earn some money!
steps.description: Preferably in jewels. Try the chapter select and click 6-3. More in tips section.

steps.headline: If you have 15,000+ special points skip the next step.
Buy an infinite weapon as this will make Money earning super easy.
Keep earning $$$.
steps.description: And special points. Good weapons for unlocking infinite ammo on. H&K PSG-1. M37. SIG P226. Lightning Hawk Magnum. (Opinion based

steps.headline: Work on time lowering.
steps.description: Blast whatever moves! Accuracy doesn't matter. Time does.

steps.headline: Unlock infinite ammo for the rocket launcher.

text: Beat the game. Easy enough. Understand the concept of unlocking with special points.  If you have a maxed out weapon. Skip the next step. Earn some money! Preferably in jewels. Try the chapter select and click 6-3. More in tips section. If you have 15,000+ special points skip the next step.  Earn some special points! Check tips section. Buy an infinite weapon as this will make Money earning super easy.  Keep earning $$$. And special points. Good weapons for unlocking infinite ammo on. H&K PSG-1. M37. SIG P226. Lightning Hawk Magnum. (Opinion based Work on time lowering. Blast whatever moves! Accuracy doesn't matter. Time does. Unlock infinite ammo for the rocket launcher.
